title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of participants in millions, with a total of 13 data points.
Overall Number of participants in millions has decreased over the Year.

Number of participants in millions is roughly constant from 2006 to 2008, slightly decreasing from 2008 to 2009, roughly constant from 2009 to 2010, slightly decreasing from 2010 to 2011, slightly increasing from 2011 to 2012, roughly constant from 2012 to 2014, slightly decreasing from 2014 to 2016, and lastly roughly constant from 2016 to 2018.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2010 and 2011.
Max Number of participants in millions about 8.4 was recorded at Year 2006
Min Number of participants in millions about 5.16 was recorded at Year 2018
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of participants in millions, with a total of 13 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2006 to 2010.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2015 to 2018.
Differently, the next significant trend is extremely decreasing which exists from 2012 to 2015.
Conversely, the next significant trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 2010 to 2012.
